definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: I - (3) - to think what has happened to the nuclear reactor.
sentences.chinese: 我一想到那个核反应堆所发生过的事情就担心不已。

sentences.english: Nuclear reactors are net positive in terms of supporting the grid.
sentences.chinese: 在支持输电网方面，核反应堆是正极。

sentences.english: It has also destroyed the cooling tower at its reactor at Yongbyon.
sentences.chinese: 北韩还炸毁了宁边核反应堆的冷却塔。

sentences.english: Development of research on protective zircaloy claddings in nuclear reactor was reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 综述了核反应堆中锆合金防护型包壳的研究进展。

sentences.english: A nuclear fusion is a thermonuclear reaction.
sentences.chinese: 核聚变是一种热核反应。

sentences.english: China said it will continue with plans to build about twenty-five new nuclear reactors.
sentences.chinese: 中国表示将继续与计划兴建约二五新的核反应堆。

sentences.english: However, plans are under consideration for above-ground storage of spent fuel from reactors.
sentences.chinese: 然而，人们正在计划将来自核反应的废料在地面储藏。

sentences.english: He says the priority remains stabilising the nuclear reactors at Fukushima and restoring safety.
sentences.chinese: 他表示首要工作是稳定福岛的核反应堆，恢复安全。

sentences.english: Nuclear release can take place as a result of the nuclear reaction.
sentences.chinese: 作为核反应的结果，核泄漏有可能发生。

sentences.english: Nuclear reactor refueling supervision system is developed with the configuration software.
sentences.chinese: 核反应堆换料监控系统采用组态软件进行开发。

sentences.english: The fuel was enriched with uranium 235 for the nuclear reactor.
sentences.chinese: 核反应堆的燃料被铀235浓缩。

sentences.english: These are enclosed in long metal tubes, which becomes fuel rods for nuclear reactors.
sentences.chinese: 这些被封装在长金属管里，变成了核反应的原料棒。

sentences.english: A nuclear reactor is only part of the life-cycle for nuclear power.
sentences.chinese: 核反应堆只是核电站运作周期中的一环。

sentences.english: Prior to the Fukushima accident, the country had 54 functioning reactors.
sentences.chinese: 前福岛事故，有54国运作的核反应堆。

sentences.english: The thermonuclear reactions of the sun energize the human body.
sentences.chinese: 太阳的热核反应给人类以能量。

sentences.english: Thorium-based molten salt nuclear reactors for the future!
sentences.chinese: 为了未来的钍基熔盐核反应堆。

definition: neutrino (particle physics)/also written 微中子[wei1 zhong1 zi3]
deuterium 2H/heavy hydrogen, isotope of hydrogen having 1 neutron in its nucleus, so atomic weight 2
tritium 3H/radioactive isotope of hydrogen having 2 neutrons in its nucleus, so atomic weight 3
